name: MeatUp
description:
MeatUp -  Created by: 12, Dairygold, DFiB 

** Recommended to play in full screen.** 

This game is an entry for the Mini Jam 128: Health (3/16/23 - 3/19/23).

The limitation for this 72 hour game jam was "The Only Way To Go Is Up."

In this game you are a living meatball. Your goal is to survive. You do this by eliminating and avoiding enemy threats, while frantically moving upward to escape the pursuing threat of hungry hands. 

Using your blood belch and the helpful jelly pads in the environment, you can propel yourself up to safer heights.

Controls:

  • Left Click - Shoot & Move
  • A & D - Move left, right
  • Go up
  • Survive and kill enemies to score
